item.title: Happy at work
item.description:
Hi, welcome to our HR site, created just for the fun at our Hackathon by Katarina, Milica and Filip.

Your happiness is our happiness and we would love if you can fill out this questionnaire to find out how are you doing :)

Interesting things happening in town relating to HR and personal growth and development

Useful books for self development and personal growth
